name: TRACHI - InvAsion
description:
Two people and a room – A story and a firearm.

An isometric kinetic novel.  
A tale about loose ends, love – and ligatures.

"All that buildup, just for that?"

Everyone has a secret.
Even you.

Content Warning:
Depictions of abuse, coercion, blood,
light torture and profanity.

   

Technicals

To be released on August 26th 2022.
Also available on Steam.
